value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The great house <add place="above">that <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-tlat" key="Latimer, Thomas">Latimer</rs> deplored</add> is visible in the pages of Lady <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-aclif" key="Clifford, Ann">Anne</rs></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-aclif" key="Clifford, An">Cliffords</rs> diary. <del>It is</del> <del>It is stuffed with</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>furniture</del> <del>it is</del> She <del>is above all things possessive</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>She is aware from her first youth of her</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>rights, <del>of her position</del> She <del>is</del> has her [fields?]</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>[graved?] upon her lands.</del> <del>She has no</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">She has no <del>doubt whatsoever tha</del> a</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">profound <add>& [fervent?]</add> belief in the rights as the possessor.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">It <del>Even as</del> <del>Solid</del> <del>She believes, with a</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">in the solidity of the land; in the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>rights of ownership</del> <del>The reality of the</del> <del>body is</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The body is visible to her. She <del>sma</del> is for ever</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">beholding castles; acquiring land, asserting her</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">rights to property; accumulating; hoarding</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">claiming diamond buttons, making inventories of her</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">possessions, establishing her family, sending for her</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">grand children so that <del>m</del> they too may</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">taste the delights of possession. <del>She</del> <del>No</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The living body is robed in black taffeta with a</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">yellow taffeta wan [breast?]. When the body is</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">dead, it is wrapped in lead; <del>to</del> as if <del>those were</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">it <del>were</del> to preserve it as long as possible <add place="above">from decay</add>. The</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">sense of the body permeates her pages: the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">solidity of matter; <del>the</del> as if <del>silver, diamonds,</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">fur <del>cloaks esp</del> <del>enforced some</del> <del>were a</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the body gained in dignity, <del>were more <add place="above">was</add></del> the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">human soul <del>were</del> <add place="above">was</add> more expressive, more itself</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">when it's carcass fleshed. <del>to</del> <add type="above">in</add> to the public eye</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>the body is</del> <del>She reveals the emptiness of</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>England, when, surely to see an old countess [bared?]</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>the common people come flocking.</del> <del>l</del> The</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">effort of <del>moving across</del> All movements</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">become spectacular. Six bay horses drag the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">coach. The coach is laced with green cloth &</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">laced with green & black silk lace; crowds</l>

<add xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" place="margin">
            <l>as if to solidify</l>
            <l>them still further</l>
          </add>
